hero.description: Driving innovation with Big Data & AI

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Creative Developer and AI passionate
about.info: I am a passionate software engineer with 1 year of proffesional experience and a growing expertise in FullStack development, Big Data, Machine Lerning and generative AI. I love creating innovative solutions that leverage the power of technology to solve real-world problems. My journey in the tech world has been driven by a relentless curiosity and a desire to push the boundaries of what is possible with code and to create value for businesses.
about.nowadays: Currently I am searching for new opportunities to apply my skills and contribute to exciting projects in the fields of software development, Big Data and AI. I am eager to collaborate with like-minded professionals and organizations that share my passion for innovation and technology. Let's connect and explore how we can create impactful solutions together!
